name: e2e-tests
description: For running end to end tests we use testcafe (https://testcafe.io/) along with its official electron plugin (https://github.com/DevExpress/testcafe-browser-provider-electron)

scripts.test:build: lerna run distUbuntu --scope quiet --stream && npm run test
scripts.test:dev: npm run build:app && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env E2E_TEST=true DATA_DIR=e2e DEBUG='waggle*,quiet*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe --color --hostname localhost -S --screenshots-full-page -p '${DATE}_${TIME}_${TEST_ID}.png' "electron:../frontend" "./**/newUser.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:win: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env E2E_TEST=true DATA_DIR=e2e DEBUG='waggle*,quiet*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe --color --hostname localhost -S --screenshots-full-page "electron:../frontend" "./**/newUser.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env E2E_TEST=true DATA_DIR=e2eSmoke DEBUG='waggle*,quiet*,testcafe:*electron*,frontend*' testcafe --color --hostname localhost -S --screenshots-full-page -p '${DATE}_${TIME}_${TEST_ID}.png' "electron:." "./**/smokeTest.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:smoke:win: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env E2E_TEST=true DATA_DIR=e2eSmoke DEBUG='waggle*,quiet*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe --color --hostname localhost -S --screenshots-full-page "electron:." "./**/smokeTest.e2e.ts"
